text: How do I get the translated page URL in hubl? I have some translated pages on a site and the URL on those pages changes from the original domain, is there anyway I can grab the translated URL?
Would this work in replacing .us with .nl for example - {{ request.full_url|regex_replace(?<TLD>\.\w+?)(?:$|\/) }}

```activeBranch: false
activeNode: false

That's what I get pprinting the return of `menu()`
Can you share/DM a link to this?

Hi there! Does anyone know how to access the HubSpot User’s profile photo/avatar within templates, specifically the custom quote template? Not that it probably matters what template is. I’d really appreciate any help you can offer! I’ve tried quite a few possibilities and can’t seem to find the right variable...content, template_data, contact…
